Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.description: Got more questions? Connect with us on Facebook

faqs.a: KeywordLeadGen is an AI-powered platform specifically designed to help businesses generate leads from Reddit. Our platform automatically discovers relevant discussions, identifies high-intent prospects, and helps you engage authentically to convert Redditors into customers.

KeywordLeadGen uses advanced AI to monitor relevant subreddits 24/7, analyze user intent, and identify sales opportunities. You'll receive real-time alerts for high-intent discussions, and our AI assistant helps you engage authentically to convert prospects into leads.

faqs.q: What features do I get with KeywordLeadGen?
faqs.a: You get access to our AI-powered subreddit discovery, intent detection, 24/7 discussion monitoring, smart reply assistant, lead scoring, and comprehensive analytics. Plus, you can export qualified leads directly to your CRM system.

faqs.q: Can I customize KeywordLeadGen for my specific business?
faqs.a: Absolutely! KeywordLeadGen adapts to your business needs with custom keyword tracking, personalized intent filters, and tailored response templates. You can track specific subreddits, monitor competitor mentions, and customize lead scoring criteria.

We continuously improve KeywordLeadGen with weekly feature updates based on user feedback and Reddit's evolving landscape. Our AI models are regularly trained on new data to ensure the highest accuracy in lead detection and engagement suggestions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At KeywordLeadGen, our mission is simple: to empower businesses by automating lead generation and data scraping through cutting-edge AI technology. We believe that businesses, regardless of size, should have access to high-quality leads and insights without the manual work.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: KeywordLeadGen provides AI-driven solutions for automated lead generation, social media scraping, and keyword and hashtag research. Our platform extracts data from public sources like Reddit, making it easy for businesses to track trends, gather leads, and optimize their marketing strategies.
